definitions.text: the property of being an amount by which something is less than expected or required
examples: new blood vessels bud out from the already dilated vascular bed to make up the nutritional deficit

definitions.text: a deficiency or failure in neurological or mental functioning
examples: the people concerned have a deficit in verbal memory

definitions.text: (sports) the score by which a team or individual is losing
an excess of liabilities over assets (usually over a certain period)
examples: last year there was a serious budgetary deficit
